articles.title: Special Texas House investigative committee releases Uvalde school shooting report - Austin American-Statesman
articles.description: The report on the Uvalde school shooting, released Sunday, was compiled by a special Texas House committee that interviewed 33 witnesses in private.
articles.content: UVALDE The first in-depth report on the Uvalde school shooting, released to the public and victims' families Sunday, determined that top-to-bottom failures combined to turn the May 24 attack into the… [+14107 chars]

articles.title: America Travel: Thousands of locals reveal things they wish visitors knew - New Zealand Herald
articles.description: From 24/7 diners to planning visits around a certain holiday, thousands share advice.
articles.content: From stopping at 24/7 diners to getting pulled over by police, thousands of American's share their advice for your next trip to the US. Photo / 123rfWhen travelling to a country with an obviously dif… [+4931 chars]

articles.author: Richard Lawler
articles.title: Chris Evans calls his iPhone 12 Pro too heavy, asks Apple for a home button - The Verge
articles.description: Chris Evans, who has played Captain America and is now starring in a new Netflix flick, The Gray Man, is complaining about his new iPhone 12 Pro. It’s too heavy, and Apple ditched the home button that was on his old iPhone 6S.
articles.content:
Chris Evans as Lloyd Hansen in The Gray Man
Image: Paul Abell/Netflix
Fans of buttons can count on Captain America for support, as Chris Evans notes that even after a few weeks with a newer phone, … [+1682 chars]

articles.title: Sanders accuses Manchin of 'intentionally sabotaging' Biden's agenda by opposing Build Back Better - New York Post
articles.description: “​In my humble opinion, you know, Manchin represents the very wealthiest people in this country, not working families in West Virginia or America​,” Sen. Bernie Sanders said.
